attributes.action: Make it law that crimes against white people are recorded as hate crimes.
attributes.additional_details: This is a real threat to us and our children and it is the Governments duty to protect us.
attributes.background: The powers that be want to belittle the problem and pretend it does not exist with press blackouts and false reporting, if any.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Hate crimes committed against a person based on their race are already illegal. Policing and prosecution decisions are operational decisions for the police and the Crown Prosecution Service.

If you think that a crime has been committed, you should contact the police here:

https://www.police.uk/contact/
